bibl.title: Lexicon of the Greek and Roman Cities and Place Names in Antiquity. Ca 1500 B.C. - Ca. A.D. 500. Edited by K. BRANIGAN, N. DEMAND, F. FELTEN, A.M. HAKKERT, E. OLSHAUSEN, V. VELKOV, R.F. WILLETS, G. WIRTH, K.A. WORP. Fascicle 2. Ad Novas. 3 - Agla Minor.
bibl.note: Les notices relatives aux toponymes égyptiens sont rédigées par K.A. WORP.
bibl.seg: HAKKERT Adolf M. (General Editor), Lexicon of the Greek and Roman Cities and Place Names in Antiquity. Ca 1500 B.C. - Ca. A.D. 500. Edited by K. BRANIGAN, N. DEMAND, F. FELTEN, A.M. HAKKERT, E. OLSHAUSEN, V. VELKOV, R.F. WILLETS, G. WIRTH, K.A. WORP. Fascicle 2. Ad Novas. 3 - Agla Minor.
Amsterdam, A.M. Hakkert, 1993, 4°, coll. 161-320, nombr. cartes. ISBN 90-256-1033-1. 45 fr. s.
Les notices relatives aux toponymes égyptiens sont rédigées par K.A. WORP.
Hakkert Branigan Demand Felten Olshausen Velkov Willets Wirth Worp
